question.body: What type of food are nucleic acids found in?

multiple_choice.choice: DNA and RNA are found in vegetables only.
DNA and RNA are found in animals only.
DNA and RNA are found in all once living things.
DNA and RNA are not nucleic acids.

response.feedback: Incorrect. DNA and RNA are found in all cell types.
Incorrect. DNA and RNA are found in all cell types.
Correct. DNA and RNA are nucleic acids that are found in all cell types.
Incorrect. DNA and RNA are nucleic acids.
